directions: In a 5 quart slow cooker, combine olive oil, onion, garlic, carrot, spinach, tomato paste, mushrooms, salt, oregano, basil, crushed red pepper, bay leaves and tomatoes.
Cover and cook on high for 4 hours.  Stir, reduce heat to low and cook for 1 to 2 hours more.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (28 ounce) can peeled and crushed tomatoes, with liquid
title: Slow Cooker Spinach Marinara Sauce
